</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">This announcement is a summary of the 2015 Interim 
Report of China Petroleum &amp; Chemical Corporation (&#8220;Sinopec 
Corp&#8221;). The entire report is also contained in the website of the Shanghai
Stock Exchange (www.sse.com.cn), The Stock Exchange of Hong Kong Limited 
(&#8220;Hong Kong Stock Exchange&#8221;) (www.hkex.com.hk) and Sinopec Corp. 
(www.sinopec.com). The investors should read the 2015 interim report for more 
details.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>

0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>

<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 
11pt">1.2</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The interim financial statements for the six-month 
period ended 30 June 2015 (the &#8220;reporting period&#8221;) of Sinopec Corp. 
and its subsidiaries (&#8220;the Company&#8221;), prepared in accordance with 
the Accounting Standards for Business Enterprises (&#8220;ASBE&#8221;) of the 
PRC, and International Financial Reporting Standards (&#8220;IFRS&#8221;), have 
been audited by PricewaterhouseCoopers Zhong Tian LLP and PricewaterhouseCoopers
Certified Public Accountants respectively, and both firms have issued standard 
unqualified opinions on the interim financial statements contained in this 
announcement.</font></div>
</td>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">3</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Number of Shareholders and 
Shareholdings of Principal Shareholders</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">As at 30 June 2015 there were a total of 915,654 
shareholders of Sinopec Corp., of which 909,358 were holders of A shares and 
6,296 were holders of H shares. The public float of Sinopec Corp. satisfied the 
minimum requirements under the Rules Governing the Listing of Securities on The 
Stock Exchange of Hong Kong Limited (the &#8220;Hong Kong Listing 
Rules&#8221;).</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>

9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">5</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Save as disclosed above, the directors, supervisors and 
other senior management of Sinopec Corp. and their associates did not hold 
shares, bonds or any interest or short position (including any interest or short
position in shares that is regarded or treated as being held in accordance with 
the Securities and Futures Ordinance (the &#8220;Ordinance&#8221;)) in the 
shares of Sinopec Corp. or any associated corporation (Please refer to the 
Interpretation of Part XV of the Ordinance), which, according to Divisions 7 and
8 of Part XV of the Ordinance, shall be informed to Sinopec Corp. and Hong Kong 
Stock Exchange, or pursuant to Section 352 of the Ordinance, shall be registered
on the designated register as required by the Ordinance, or the Model Code for 
Securities Transactions by Directors of Listed Issuers (the &#8220;Model 
Code&#8221;) contained in the Hong Kong Listing Rules, shall be informed to 
Sinopec Corp. or Hong Kong Stock Exchange.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">5</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Business Review and 
Management&#8217;s Discussion and Analysis</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 
11pt">5.1</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Business Review</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">In the first half of 2015, the global economic recovery 
remained slow. China&#8217;s GDP grew by 7.0%. The domestic demand of crude oil 
maintained a steady growth, increasing 4.8% year on year, and natural gas demand
growth slowed down, up 2.1% year on year. Refined oil products demand continue 
to diversify following last year&#8217;s trend with a slower growth rate. 
Gasoline and kerosene consumption increased substantially while diesel dropped
slightly. The total consumption of refined oil products grew by 3% compared with
the same period of last year. Quality upgrading of oil products was accelerated.
Domestic oil products prices were adjusted timely in line with the international
oil price changes. Domestic demand for chemicals maintained a steady growth with
the ethylene equivalent consumption up by 2.5% compared with the same period of 
last year.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The international crude oil prices plunged in the second
half of last year and fluctuated at low level in the first half of this year. 
The average spot price of Platts Brent for the first half of this year was USD 
57.84 per barrel, 46.90% lower than the same period of last year.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">6</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT:
0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><img src="chart.jpg" alt=""></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">7</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 
11pt">5.1.1</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">PRODUCTION AND OPERATIONS</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 
11pt">(1)</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Exploration and Production</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The Company took effective measures in low oil price 
environment in the first half of 2015, including optimising the exploration and 
production plans, setting up flexible investment decision making mechanism and 
cutting high-cost crude oil production. In exploration, we attained new 
discoveries and commercial flows in marine facies gas fields in the west of 
Sichuan. In development, the Fuling shale gas project progressed 
steadily.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Oil and gas production in the first half was 232.95 
million barrels of oil equivalent, down by 1.7% compared with same period of 
last year. Domestic and overseas crude oil production amounted to 147.47 million
barrels and 26.60 million barrels respectively while natural gas production 
reached 353.26 billion cubic feet.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 46px">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td width="1599">
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Exploration and Production: Summary 
of Operations</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>

9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>

<td align="left" valign="bottom" width="64%">

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">8</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 
11pt">(2)</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Refining</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The Company, while focusing on profitability, optimised 
the crude oil allocation and processing plans, adjusted the product slate and 
utilisation rate, and increased the yield of high value-added products, such as 
high-spec gasoline. We brought our scale advantages into full play to control 
the unit cost. We actively promoted the quality upgrading of refined oil 
products and provide high standard fuels to the market. We took advantages of 
specialised by improving our dedicated marketing network, we optimised the sales
of other refining products such as lubricants, LPG, asphalt, etc. In the first 
half of 2015, we processed 119 million tonnes of crude oil, up by 2.7% compared 
with the first half of 2014. Refined oil products output rose by 4.4% with jet 
fuel and high-spec gasoline up by 18.9% and 18.2% respectively.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Refining: Summary of
Operations</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>

9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">9</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 
11pt">(3)</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Marketing and Distribution</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">In the first half of 2015, in light of the changes in 
supply and demand, the Company optimised marketing structure to increase retail 
volume and single station throughput. We accelerated the transformation from an 
oil products supplier to a comprehensive service provider by complimenting the 
rapid development of non-fuel business with that of fuel business and achieving 
volume and profit growth.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">In the first half of 2015, the total sales volume of 
refined oil products grew by 5.3% to 92.97 million tonnes, of which domestic 
sales were 83.92 million tonnes, up 3.6% from the same period of previous year. 
Revenue from our non-fuel business reached RMB 13.33 billion, an increase of 
85.4% from the same period in 2014.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>

10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>

<td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 27pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: arial, sans-serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Company-operated</font></div>
</td>
<td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT:

<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">10</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 
11pt">(4)</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Chemicals</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">In the first half of 2015, the Company further optimised
feedstock and product mix to achieve better cost efficiency. We put our efforts 
in R&amp;D, production and marketing of new products, and maintained production 
volume growth in high value-added products, the ratio of performance compound in
synthetic resin and differentiation rate of synthetic fiber rose to 57.7% and 
81.0% respectively, up by 1.4 and 2.4 percentage points compared with the same 
period of last year. The chemical segment achieved better performance by 
strengthening the coordination between production and marketing.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">In the first half of 2015, ethylene production reached 
5.457 million tonnes, up 7.3% from the same period of last year, and chemical 
sales volume was 30.3 million tonnes, up 3.8% compared with the same period of 
last year.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="left">

roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr>
<td align="right" valign="top" width="75%">

0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: arial, sans-serif;

Operations</font></div>
</td>

tonnes</font></div>
</td>

inline; FONT-FAMILY: arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">&#160;</font></td>
<td valign="bottom" width="9%" style="TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: 
inline; FONT-FAMILY: arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">483</font></td>
<td nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 
11pt">&#160;</font></td>
<td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">&#160;</font></td>
<td valign="bottom" width="1%" style="TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font style="DISPLAY: 
inline; FONT-FAMILY: arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">&#160;</font></td>
<td valign="bottom" width="9%" style="TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: 
inline; FONT-FAMILY: arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">(6.21</font></td>
<td nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 
11pt">)</font></td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 48px">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td width="1597">
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Note: Includes 100% of production of joint 
ventures.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 
11pt">5.1.2</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Health, Safety and the Environment</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">In the first half of 2015, the Company fully implemented
safety responsibilities at all levels, conducted specific safety inspections, 
and took identification and management on potential hazards. We made optimal 
adjustments to emergency response system and promoted HSE conformance. Hence we 
maintained work safety in general.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">We pay close attention to environment protection, energy
saving, emission reduction as well as green and low-carbon development. We 
promoted Contract Energy Management and construction of energy management 
system, and implemented &#8220;Clear Water and Blue Sky&#8221; program. 
Comparing to the same period last year, the Company&#8217;s energy intensity was
down by 2.77%, COD in discharged wastewater was down by 4.09%, SO2 emission was 
down by 4.84%, NOx emission was down by 4.23%, Ammoniacal Nitrogen emission was
down by 3.91%.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">11</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 
11pt">5.1.3</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Capital Expenditures</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The Company focused on quality and profitability of 
business expansions, and optimised its assets portfolio and investment. A number
of key projects have been well underway. CAPEX for the first half was RMB 23.508
billion. CAPEX for E&amp;P was RMB 13.418 billion, mainly for exploration and 
development in Shengli oil field, Tahe oil field and Sichuan Basin, the LNG 
projects in Guangxi and Tianjin, pipeline-boosting for Sichuan to East China Gas
Transmission Project, construction of pipelines exporting gas from Fuling shale 
gas filed, Jinan-to-Qingdao Gas Transmission Pipeline II Project, and overseas 
projects. CAPEX for Refining was RMB 3.187 billion, mainly for refinery 
revamping and gasoline and diesel quality upgrading projects in Qilu and 
Jiujiang refineries. CAPEX for Marketing and Distribution was RMB 3.781 billion,
mainly for developing and renovating service stations, building oil products 
pipelines, oil depots and other storage facilities, and specific projects for 
safety hazards rectification and vapor recovery. We newly developed 207 service 
stations in the first half of 2015. CAPEX for Chemicals was RMB 2.519 billion, 
mainly for the East Ningxia coal chemical project and the Wuhan ethylene 
project. CAPEX for Corporate and Others was RMB 603 million, mainly for R&amp;D 
facilities and IT application projects.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">

<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">

</td>
<td>

</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"

<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE:

</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-

</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"

<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">In the first half of 2015, the Company&#8217;s turnover 
and other operating revenues were RMB 1,040.4 billion, decreased by 23.3% with 
the same period last year, and operating profit was RMB 40.5 billion, 
representing a decline of 22.4% from the same period last year.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>

</td>

<td nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font

<td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-

<td valign="bottom" width="1%" style="TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font style="DISPLAY:

inline; FONT-FAMILY: arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">6,214</font></td>
<td nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 
11pt">&#160;</font></td>

FAMILY: arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">&#160;</font></td>

inline; FONT-FAMILY: arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">&#160;</font></td>

inline; FONT-FAMILY: arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">1,308</font></td>

style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE:

</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">13</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 
11pt">5.2.1</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Turnover and other operating revenues</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 22.7pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">In the first half of 2015, the Company&#8217;s turnover 
was RMB 1,021.7 billion, representing a decrease of 23.6 % over the first half 
of 2014.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 22.7pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The following table sets forth the external sales 
volume, average realised prices and respective percentage changes of the 
Company&#8217;s major products in the first half of 2015 as compared with the 
first half of 2014.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>

9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Most of the crude oil and a small portion of natural gas
produced by the Company were used internally for refining and chemical 
production with the remainder sold to external customers. In the first half of 
2015, the turnover from crude oil, natural gas and other upstream products sold 
externally amounted to RMB 29.0 billion, decreased by 16.4% year on year, 
accounting for 2.8% of the Company&#8217;s turnover and other operating 
revenues. The change was mainly due to the sharp decline of crude oil 
prices.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Petroleum products (mainly consisting of refined oil 
products and other refined petroleum products) sold by the refining segment and 
the marketing and distribution segment achieved external sales revenues of RMB 
619.0 billion, representing a decrease of 23.5% over the same period of 2014 and
accounting for 59.5% of the Company&#8217;s turnover and other operating 
revenues, this was mainly due to the sharp decline of oil product prices 
offsetting the effect of increase in sales volumes of gasoline, kerosene and 
other refined petroleum products. The sales revenue of gasoline, diesel and 
kerosene was RMB 519.1 billion, representing a decrease of 21.1% over the same 
period in 2014, accounting for 83.9% of the sales revenue of petroleum products.
Sales revenue of other refined petroleum products was RMB 99.9 billion, 
representing a decline of 34.2% compared with the first half of 2014, accounting
for 16.1% of the sales revenue of petroleum products.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt"><br>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The Company&#8217;s external sales revenue of chemical 
products was RMB 140.8 billion, representing a decrease of 20.6% over the same 
period of 2014, accounting for 13.5% of its turnover and other operating 
revenues. The change was mainly due to the decline of chemical products prices 
which offset the effect of increase in sales volumes of basic chemical feedstock
and synthetic resin.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT:

id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE:

<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 
11pt">5.2.2</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Operating expenses</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">In the first half of 2015, the Company&#8217;s operating
expenses were RMB 999.8 billion, representing a decrease of 23.3% over the first
half of 2014. The operating expenses mainly consisted of the 
following:</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Purchased crude oil, products and operating supplies and expenses 
</font>were RMB 770.4 billion in the first half of 2015, representing a decrease
of 29.9% over the same period of 2014, accounting for 77.1% of the total 
operating expenses, of which:</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: MS Gothic, &#8218;l&#8218;r 
&#402;S&#402;V&#402;b&#402;N, monospace">&#8231;</font></font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Crude oil purchasing expenses were RMB 251.6 billion, 
representing a decrease of 40.8% over the same period of 2014. Total processed 
volume of crude oil purchased externally in the first half of 2015 was 89.87 
million tonnes (excluding the volume processed for third parties), increased by 
3.6% over the first half of 2014. The average unit processing cost of crude oil 
purchased externally was RMB 2,800 per tonne, decreased by 42.8% over the first
half of 2014.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: MS Gothic, &#8218;l&#8218;r 
&#402;S&#402;V&#402;b&#402;N, monospace">&#8231;</font></font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Other purchasing expenses were RMB 518.8 billion, down 
by 23.1% year on year, mainly due to decline of external raw material purchase 
prices.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Selling, general and administrative expenses</font> of the Company totaled
RMB 32.2 billion, representing a decrease of 4.7% over the first half of 
2014.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Depreciation, depletion and amortisation expenses</font> of the Company 
were RMB 46.2 billion, representing an increase of 7.0% compared with the first 
half of 2014. This was mainly due to the increase of continuous investments in 
property, plant and equipment.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Exploration expenses</font> in the first half of 2015 were RMB 6.0 
billion, representing an increase of 8.6% compared with the same period in 2014.
This was mainly due to the increase of implantation progress of overall 
exploration workload compared with the same period in 2014.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT:

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">15</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">Personnel expenses</font> were RMB 26.6 billion, representing a decrease 
of 0.6% over the first half of 2014.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Taxes 
other than income tax</font> were RMB 119.9 billion, representing an increase of
27.9% compared with the first half of 2014. This was mainly due to the increase 
of RMB 35.2 billion in consumption tax as a result of increased consumption tax 
rate, as well as the RMB 4.7 billion increase in city construction tax and 
educational surcharge; meanwhile the special oil income levy decreased by RMB 
12.4 billion as a result of decreased oil price.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT:
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 
11pt">5.2.3</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Operating profit</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">In the first half of 2015, the Company&#8217;s operating
profit was RMB 40.5 billion, representing a decrease of 22.4% over the same 
period in 2014, mainly due to international crude oil prices dropped, the profit
of upstream segment decreased.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 
11pt">5.2.4</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Net finance costs</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">In the first half of 2015, the Company&#8217;s net 
finance costs were RMB 3.4 billion, representing a year-on-year decrease of 
61.1%, of which: because the Company compressed the occupancy of working capital
and improved asset-liability structure and reduced the finance costs, the net 
interest expense was decreased RMB 2.0 billion; losses from changes in fair 
value of the Sinopec CB issued by the Company was RMB 0.3 billion, compared with
a loss of RMB 2.2 billion in the same period of 2014; gains from foreign 
currency exchange was RMB 0.2 billion due to slight Renminbi appreciation, 
compared with a loss of 1.3 billion in the same period of 2014.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 
11pt">5.2.5</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Profit before taxation</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE:

<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">In the first half of 2015, the Company&#8217;s profit 
before taxation amounted to RMB 41.3 billion, representing a decrease of 9.8% 
compared with the first half of 2014.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT:

<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">

</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-

</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>

0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"

<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">In the first half of 2015, income tax expense of the 
Company totaled RMB 9.7 billion, down by 18.8% from the same period of 
2014.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>

</td>
<td>

Company</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT:

<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"

<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">In the first half of 2015, profit attributable to non-
controlling shareholders was RMB 6.2 billion, an increase of 375.1% over the 
same period of 2014, The non-controlling interests of the Company has increased,
this was mainly due to the completion of capital injection of Sinopec Marketing 
Company Limited.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>

</td>

Company</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>

<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">

10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">In the first half of 2015, profit attributable to equity
shareholders of the Company was RMB 25.4 billion, representing a decrease of 
22.0 % over the same period of 2014.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT:

<div id="FTR">

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">16</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 
11pt">5.2.9</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Assets, liabilities, equity and cash flows</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">

current assets decreased by RMB 15.6 billion.</font></div>

</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT:
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">As at 30 June 2015, total equity attributable to equity 
shareholders of the Company was RMB 680.1 billion, representing an increase of 
RMB 87.0 billion compared with that at the end of 2014, which was mainly due to 
the capital premium from capital injection to Sinopec Marketing Company Limited 
by non-controlling interests, conversion of Sinopec CB and increased retained 
earnings from the net profit for this period.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 
11pt">(2)</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Cash Flow</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">

<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The following table sets forth the major items on the
consolidated cash flow statements for the first half of 2015 and 
2014.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">In the first half of 2015, net cash generated from 
operating activities was RMB 67.4 billion, representing an increase of RMB 9.2 
billion in cash inflow over the first half of 2014. This was mainly due to the 
decrease of occupancy of working capital over the first half of
2014.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">In the first half of 2015, net cash generated from 
investing activities was RMB 55.0 billion, representing a decrease of RMB 7.7 
billion in cash outflow compared with the same period last year, which was 
mainly caused by the reduction of investment scale.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">In the first half of 2015, net cash generated from 
financing activities was RMB 51.0 billion, representing an increase of RMB 48.5 
billion in cash inflow from the same period of last year, this was mainly due to
cash inflow caused by capital injection to Sinopec Marketing Company Limited 
from non-controlling interests which amounted to RMB 105.0 billion, and partly 
offset by the cash outflow caused by repayment of high interest bearing 
debts.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">As of 30 June 2015, the Company&#8217;s cash and cash 
equivalents (exchange rates effects excluded) were RMB 72.5 billion, an increase
of RMB 63.5 billion as of 31 December 2014.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT:

RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">

FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>

</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td nowrap style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: text-
top">*</font>:</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Gross profit margin = (Operating income &#8211; 
Operating cost, tax and surcharges) / Operating income</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt">
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 
11pt">5.4</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Business Prospects</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>
