</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block">&#160;</div>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">I.</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">Overview of the Connected Transaction</font></font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">On 26 August 2015, Sinopec Corp. 
entered into an equity transfer agreement with Baichuan Co., pursuant to which, 
Sinopec Corp proposed to transfer 100% equity interest of Jingtian Co. held by 
it to Baichuan Co., at the consideration of RMB854,205,200 (subject to the final
valuation filing).</font></div>
<br>
<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">&#8212; 1 &#8212;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Upon completion of the 
Transaction, Baichuan Co. will become the shareholder of Jingtian Co. with 100% 
equity interest, and Jingtian Co. will cease to be a subsidiary of Sinopec 
Corp.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Baichuan Co., a wholly state-
owned enterprise, is directly and wholly owned by Sinopec Group, the controlling
shareholder of Sinopec Corp.. Pursuant to Chapter 14A of the Listing Rules, 
Sinopec Group and its subsidiaries are connected persons of Sinopec Corp., the 
Transaction therefore constitutes a connected transaction under the Listing 
Rules. As certain applicable percentage ratios of the Transaction exceed 0.1% 
but fall below 5%, the Transaction is subject to the reporting and announcement 
requirements but is exempt from independent shareholders&#8217; approval
requirement under Chapter 14A of the Listing Rules.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">II.</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">Basic Information on the Parties to the Transaction and their 
connected Relationships</font></font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">(I)</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; 
DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Basic information on the connected 
persons</font></font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">As of the date of this 
announcement, the basic information on Baichuan Co. is set out as 
follows:</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline;
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Name: Sinopec Baichuan Economic and Trading Company 
</font>(<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: PMingLiU, 
&#183;s&#178;&#211;&#169;&#250;&#197;&#233;, 
serif">&#20013;&#30707;&#21270;&#30334;&#24029;&#32147;&#28639; 
&#36031;&#26131;&#20844;&#21496;</font>)</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Registered address: </font>Block 1, No. 22 Chaoyangmen North 
Street, Chaoyang District, Beijing</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Contributor: </font>Sinopec Group</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Legal representative: </font>Yang Jun</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Date of incorporation: </font>9 February 1993</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Registered capital: </font>RMB30,000,000</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Enterprise nature: </font>wholly state-owned</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Business license No.: </font>100000000012890</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Principal business: </font>hotels; catering services; 
property services; retail; conference services; exhibition services, 
etc.</font></div>
<br>
<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">&#8212; 2 &#8212;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Financial condition and development of the principal business
during the last three years: </font>In 2013, the audited operating income of 
Baichuan Co. amounted to RMB210.32 million, with the net loss of RMB41.29 
million. As at the end of 2013, the audited total assets of Baichuan Co. 
amounted to RMB3,275.65 million, with the net assets of RMB757.44 
million.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">In 2014, the audited operating 
income of Baichuan Co. amounted to RMB180.53 million, with the net loss of 
RMB81.93 million. As at the end of 2014, the total audited assets of Baichuan 
Co. amounted to RMB4,158.23 million, with the net assets of RMB1,244.18 
million.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">In recent years, due to the great
market impact on accommodation, catering, conference tourism and other service 
businesses, the principal businesses of Baichuan Co. have witnessed a decline as
compared with prior years.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Other relationships with Sinopec Corp.: </font>Baichuan Co. 
is a subsidiary of Sinopec Group, which is the controlling shareholder of 
Sinopec Corp. Save as mentioned above, there are no other significant 
relationships in terms of property rights, businesses, assets, credits and debts
and personnel between Baichuan Co. and Sinopec Corp.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">III.</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">Basic Information on the Transaction Subject</font></font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">(I)</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; 
DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Transaction subject</font></font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">1.</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; 
DISPLAY: inline">Transaction subject</font></font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">The subject of this connected 
transaction is 100% equity interest of Jingtian Co. held by Sinopec 
Corp.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">2.</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; 
DISPLAY: inline">Description of the ownership of target 
equity</font></font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">As of the date of this 
announcement, with clearly defined ownership, the Target Equity is free from any
mortgage, pledge or other restrictions on transfer. It is not subject to any 
litigation, arbitration or judicial actions such as seizure or freezing, nor is 
there any other circumstance that would prevent the transfer of the ownership 
thereof.</font></div>
<br>
<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">&#8212; 3 &#8212;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block">&#160;</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">3.</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; 
DISPLAY: inline">Basic Information on Jingtian Co.</font></font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Company shareholder and its shareholdings: </font>Sinopec 
Corp. with 100% equity interest</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Date of incorporation: </font>22 December 2000</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Registered capital: </font>RMB23,000,000</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Registered address: </font>Changping District, 
Beijing</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Principal business: </font>construction general 
contracting</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Financial condition: </font>According to the audit report 
(GTCNZZ (2015) No. 110ZC2647) issued by Grant Thornton, an accounting firm with 
securities and futures related business qualification (Certificate Number: 
000158) on 22 July 2015, in 2014, Jingtian Co. recorded no operating income with
the net loss of RMB2.27 million, and the net loss after deduction of 
extraordinary items reached RMB2.26 million. As at the end of 2014, the total 
assets of Jingtian Co. amounted to RMB738.06 million, with the net assets of 
RMB560.40 million. From January to March 2015, Jingtian Co. recorded no 
operating income with the net loss of RMB111.35 million, and the net loss after 
deduction of extraordinary items reached RMB111.35 million. As at the end of 
March 2015, the total assets of Jingtian Co. amounted to RMB1,715.70 million, 
with the net assets of RMB519.06 million. In addition, in 2013, Jingtian Co. 
recorded a net loss of RMB4.84 million, and a net loss after deduction of 
extraordinary items reached RMB4.84 million.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">(II)</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">Consideration and pricing basis of the connected 
transaction</font></font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">According to the Valuation Report
issued by Guorongxinghua Appraisal Co., as of the Valuation Base Date, the 
carrying amount of the audited total assets, total liabilities and net asset of
Jingtian Co. was RMB1,715.70 million, RMB1,196.64 million and RMB519.06 million,
respectively. Using the asset-based approach, the total assets of Jingtian Co. 
was evaluated at RMB2,050.85 million, representing an increase of RMB335.14 
million or 19.53%. The total liabilities was valuated at RMB1,196.64 million, 
remaining unchanged. The net assets was evaluated at RMB854.20 million, 
representing an increase of RMB335.14 million or 64.57%. On that basis, the 
consideration for the transaction was arrived at RMB854,205,200 (subject to the 
final valuation filing) after negotiation between Sinopec Corp. and Baichuan 
Co.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">According to the Valuation 
Report, the value evaluated for net assets of Jingtian Co. was 64.57% higher 
than its carrying amount, mainly due to an increase in the valuation of fixed 
assets and intangible assets. The value of fixed assets was valuated RMB96,000 
higher than its carrying amount, and that of intangible assets was RMB336.66 
million higher than its carrying amount.</font></div>
<br>
<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">&#8212; 4 &#8212;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">

</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline;

</div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block">&#160;</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE:

<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font

FONT-SIZE: 12pt">IV.</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">Major contents of the connected transaction and performance 
arrangement</font></font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">The principal terms of the Equity
Transfer Agreement entered into between Sinopec Corp. and Baichuan Co. are set 
out as follows:</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">1.</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Parties: Sinopec Corp. (as transferor) 
and Baichuan Co. (as transferee)</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">2.</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Date: 26 August 2015</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">3.</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Assets to be disposed of<font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: PMingLiU, 
&#183;s&#178;&#211;&#169;&#250;&#197;&#233;, serif">&#65306;</font>100% equity 
interest of Jingtian Co. held by Sinopec Corp.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">4.</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Transaction consideration: 
RMB854,205,200 (subject to the final valuation filing)</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">5.</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Settlement method: Baichuan Co. shall 
pay the acquisition consideration within ten Working Days in a lump sum after 
Jingtian Co. having obtained new business license and financial statements as at
the Completion Date having been issued (whichever is later).</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">6.</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Gains or losses during the period<font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: PMingLiU, 
&#183;s&#178;&#211;&#169;&#250;&#197;&#233;, serif">&#65306;</font>Gains or 
losses incurred by Jingtian Co. during the period from the Base Date to the 
Completion Date shall be settled by Sinopec Corp. and Baichuan Co. based on the 
differences between the net assets as shown on the audited financial statements 
as at the Completion Date and the financial statements as at the Base Date of 
Jingtian Co..</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">7.</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Conditions precedent to completion: The 
Agreement has been approved by Sinopec Group and filed with the SASAC. The 
Valuation Report has been filed by Sinopec Group. All such notices have been
given and such consents have been obtained if the Transaction is subject to 
giving notices to and/or obtaining the consents from third parties.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">8.</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Completion<font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: PMingLiU, &#183;s&#178;&#211;&#169;&#250;&#197;&#233;, 
serif">&#65306;</font>The completion procedures shall be handled by Sinopec 
Corp. and Baichuan Co. on the Completion Date.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">9.</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Effective time: With effect from the 
date on which it has been signed and sealed by both parties.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE:
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">10.</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Liability for breach and compensation:It
will constitute a breach if Sinopec Corp. or Baichuan Co. violates any 
representations, warranties or undertakings in the Agreement. The default party 
shall compensate the other party for the actual losses arising from such breach.
Meanwhile, if Baichuan Co. fails to pay the consideration as agreed and still 
fails to pay it upon</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<br>
<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">&#8212; 5 &#8212;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">expiry of an extended period of 
60 days, Sinopec Corp. may terminate the Agreement and Baichuan Co. shall 
compensate the actual losses suffered by Sinopec Corp due to termination of the 
Agreement which results in loss of Sinopec Corp.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">V.</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">Purpose of the Transaction and Its Effect on the 
Company</font></font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">(1)</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; 
DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Necessity of the 
Transaction</font></font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Since the principal business of 
Jingtian Co. does not fall into the scope of the principal business of Sinopec 
Corp., and Jingtian Co. has been loss-making for a long period of time, the 
Company proposes to transfer it shareholding in Jingtian Co. for cash 
consideration and focus on its principal business. As reasonably estimated by 
the board of directors, the Transaction has no material effect on the financial 
condition and results of operation of Sinopec Corp., and through the 
Transaction, Sinopec Corp. will record an profit before tax of RMB261 
million.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">(2)</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; 
DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Others</font></font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Upon completion of the 
Transaction, Jingtian Co. will no longer be consolidated into Sinopec Corp. as a
subsidiary. As at the date of this announcement, Sinopec Corp. does not provide 
guarantees for Jingtian Co. nor entrusts Jingtian Co. for wealth 
management.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">VI.</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">Approval Procedures for the Connected 
Transaction</font></font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">(1)</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; 
DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Approval by the Board of 
Directors</font></font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">From 25 to 26 August 2015, 
Sinopec Corp. convened the second meeting of the sixth session of the board 
through physical meeting, at which the resolution in relation to the Transaction
was passed with unanimous consent of all the non-connected 
directors.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">When voting on the foregoing 
resolution in relation to the connected transaction by the board of directors of
Sinopec Corp., all connected directors, namely Mr. Wang Yupu, Mr. Zhang Jianhua,
Mr. Zhang Haichao and Mr. Jiao Fangzheng, abstained from voting, and except for 
such connected directors, no other directors have material interests in the 
Transaction. The independent non-executive directors unanimously agreed the 
equity transfer.</font></div>
<br>
<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">

</div>

<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block">&#160;</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">(2)</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; 
DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Prior Approval and Independent Opinions of 
Independent Directors</font></font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Prior approval had been obtained 
from the independent non-executive directors in respect of the Transaction 
before it was submitted to the board of directors for approval and the 
independent non-executive directors expressed the following independent opinions
in respect of the Transaction: the terms of the Transaction agreement was on 
normal commercial terms, fair and reasonable to the independent shareholders and
in the interest of the Company and its shareholders as a whole. No circumstances
are detrimental to the interests of the Company and its independent 
shareholders.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">VII.</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">Information on Sinopec Corp. and Sinopec Group</font></font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Sinopec Corp. is one of the 
largest integrated energy and chemical company in China, which is mainly engaged
in oil and gas exploration and production, extraction, pipeline transmission and
marketing; oil refining; production, marketing, storage and transportation of 
petrochemicals, coal chemical, chemical fibers, chemical fertilizers and other 
chemical products; import, export and import/export agency business of oil, 
natural gas, refined oil products, petrochemicals and other chemicals and other 
commodities and technologies; research, development and application of 
technology and information.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Sinopec Group was established in 
July 1998, and it is a state authorized investment organization and a state-
controlled company, with a current registered capital of RMB274.87 billion. Upon
reorganization in 2000, Sinopec Group transferred its principal petrochemical 
business to Sinopec Corp. The principal operations of Sinopec Group include: 
procuring its subsidiaries in exploration, exploitation, storage and
transportation (including pipeline transportation), sales and comprehensive 
utilization of oil and natural gas; procuring its subsidiaries in oil refining; 
procuring its subsidiaries in wholesale and retail of oil products; procuring 
its subsidiaries in production, sales, storage, transportation of petrochemical 
and other chemical products; industrial investment and investment management; 
exploration and design, construction and installation of petroleum and 
petrochemical engineering; repairing and maintenance of petroleum and 
petrochemical equipment; manufacture of mechanical and electrical equipment; 
technology and information, research and development, application and 
consultation services of alternative energy products; import and export 
business.</font></div>
<br>
<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">&#8212; 7 &#8212;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Definition:</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt" align="left">
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="93%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new
roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr>
<td align="left" valign="top" width="26%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">&#8220;Baichuan Co.&#8221;</font></div>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: times new roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 
12pt">&#160;</font></td>
<td valign="top" width="54%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times new 
roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Sinopec Baichuan Economic and 
Trading Company</font></div>
</td>
</tr><tr>
<td valign="top" width="26%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times
new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160; </font></td>
<td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times new
roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></td>
<td valign="top" width="54%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times 
new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160; </font></td>
</tr><tr>
<td align="left" valign="top" width="26%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">&#8220;Completion 
Date&#8221;</font></div>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: times new roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 
12pt">&#160;</font></td>
<td valign="top" width="54%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times new 
roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">The last day of the month in 
which all conditions precedent have been fulfilled</font></div>
</td>
</tr><tr>
<td valign="top" width="26%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times 
new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160; </font></td>
<td valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times new
roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></td>
<td valign="top" width="54%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times 
new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160; </font></td>
</tr><tr>
<td align="left" valign="top" width="26%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">&#8220;Equity Transfer Agreement or 
Agreement&#8221;</font></div>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: times new roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 
12pt">&#160;</font></td>
<td valign="top" width="54%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times new 
roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">the Equity Transfer Agreement

Wensheng</font></div>
</td>
</tr><tr>
<td valign="top" width="31%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times 
new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160; </font></td>
<td valign="top" width="48%">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="center"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: times new roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Vice President 
and Secretary of the board of directors</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block">

Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">26 August 2015</font></div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; 
DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE:

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: right">Announcement 3<br>
</div>
<div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Hong Kong 
Exchanges and Clearing Limited and The Stock Exchange of Hong Kong Limited take 
no responsibilities for the contents of this announcement, make no 
representation as to its accuracy or completeness and expressly disclaim any 
liability whatsoever for any loss howsoever arising from or in reliance upon the
whole or any part of the contents of this announcement.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><img 
src="logo.jpg" alt=""></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Calibri, sans-
serif; FONT-SIZE: 16pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">CHINA PETROLEUM &amp; CHEMICAL 
CORPORATION</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="center"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 11pt">(a joint stock 
limited company incorporated in the People&#8217;s Republic of China with 
limited liability)</font><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0.25pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">(Stock Code: 
0386)</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0.25pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 13pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">RENEWAL OF 
CONTINUING CONNECTED TRANSACTIONS</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div align="left">
<table cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times 
new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr>
<td valign="top" width="79%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 0.5pt solid; BORDER-
LEFT: black 0.5pt solid; BORDER-TOP: black 0.5pt solid; BORDER-RIGHT: black 
0.5pt solid">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times new 
roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Reference is made to 
Corp.&#8217;s circular dated 24 August 2012 in relation to the Continuing 
Connected Transactions between the Company and the Sinopec Group. At the first 
extraordinary general meeting of 2012, the Independent Shareholders approved, 
among other things, the Major Continuing Connected Transactions, the caps for 
the three years ending 31 December 2015 for the Major Continuing Connected 
Transactions and the Non-major Continuing Connected Transactions.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font color="#231f20" size="3">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font color="#231f20" size="3"><font style="DISPLAY: 
inline; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 
12pt">Sinopec Corp. anticipates that the Continuing Connected Transactions with 
the Sinopec Group will continue after 31 December 2015.</font></font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font color="#231f20" size="3">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font color="#231f20" size="3"><font style="DISPLAY: 
inline; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">In
respect of the Continuing Connected Transactions commencing from 1 January 2016,
Sinopec Corp. and China Petrochemical Corporation entered into the Continuing 
Connected Transactions Fourth Supplemental Agreement on 26 August 2015, pursuant
to which amendments were made to the terms of certain Continuing Connected 
Transactions.</font></font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font color="#231f20" size="3">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font color="#231f20" size="3"><font style="DISPLAY: 
inline; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 
12pt">China Petrochemical Corporation, holding approximately 71.32% of the total
issued share capital of Sinopec Corp., and its associates are connected persons 
of Sinopec Corp. under the HK Listing Rules and SH Listing Rules. As such, the 
continuing transactions between the Company and the Sinopec Group constitute 
continuing connected transactions of Sinopec Corp. under Chapter 14A of the HK 
Listing Rules. Sinopec Corp. shall comply with the reporting, announcement and 
Independent Shareholders&#8217; approval requirements (if necessary) in respect 
of such continuing connected transactions.</font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</td>
</tr></table>

<div align="left">

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times new 
roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Sinopec Corp. will seek the 
approval of Independent Shareholders in respect of the Renewal of Major 
Continuing Connected Transactions (including the relevant proposed caps), and, 
in accordance with the requirements of the Shanghai Stock Exchange, the Non-
Major Continuing Connected Transactions (including the relevant proposed caps). 
A circular containing, among other things, (i) further details of the Continuing
Connected Transactions, (ii) a letter from the Independent Board Committee and 
(iii) a letter from the Independent Financial Adviser, ABCI, will be dispatched 
and/or notified to the Shareholders in due course, in any event, no later than 8
October 2015.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20;

</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold">BACKGROUND</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Reference is made to 
Corp.&#8217;s circular dated 24 August 2012 in relation to the Continuing 
Connected Transactions between the Company and the Sinopec Group. At the first 
extraordinary general meeting of 2012, the Independent Shareholders approved, 
among other things, the Major Continuing Connected Transactions, the caps for 
the three years ending 31 December 2015 for the Major Continuing Connected 
Transactions and the Non-major Continuing Connected Transactions.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">Sinopec Corp. anticipates that 
the Continuing Connected Transactions with the Sinopec Group will continue after
31 December 2015.</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">In respect of the Continuing 
Connected Transactions commencing from 1 January 2016, Sinopec Corp. and China 
Petrochemical Corporation entered into the Continuing Connected Transactions 
Fourth Supplemental Agreement on 26 August 2015, pursuant to which amendments 
were made to the terms of certain Continuing Connected Transactions. Set out 
below are the summaries of the amended Continuing Connected Transactions 
Agreements and the transactions contemplated thereunder:</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">The Continuing Connected 
Transactions are summarised below:</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20;
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">(1)</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
WEIGHT: bold">Mutual Supply Agreement</font></font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">China Petrochemical Corporation 
and Sinopec Corp. entered into a mutual supply agreement on 3 June 2000 and the 
Continuing Connected Transactions Third Supplemental Agreement on 24 August 
2012, term of which will expire on 31 December 2015. Pursuant to the Continuing 
Connected Transactions Fourth Supplemental Agreement dated 26 
August</font></div>
<br>
<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">&#8212; 2 &#8212;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 72pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0.25pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">2015, the term of the amended 
Mutual Supply Agreement is extended to 31 December 2018. The following 
transactions are contemplated under the Mutual Supply Agreement:</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 72pt">
<div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE:
10pt">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, serif; COLOR: #231f20; 
FONT-SIZE: 12pt">(a)</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman,
serif; COLOR: #231f20; FONT-SIZE: 12pt">The products and services which are 
contemplated to be supplied by the Company, including: crude oil, natural gas, 
refined and petrochemical products and by-products, semi-finished products, coal
and steel; water, electricity, gas, heat, measurements, quality inspection, 
provision of other related or similar products and services and 
guarantee.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE:
